text:
Good morning!
My computer uses Windows 2000 Professional. I downloaded apache_2.0.47-win32-
x86-no_ssl.msi, but there is always a error message "Apache monitor is already 
started." in the end.

The purpose for me to use this Apache HTTP server is to practice my Perl 
programming. I installed it at C:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2 
When I was trying to run some Perl files such as the one "printenv.pl" already 
in C:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2\cgi-bin , In URL I put 
http://localhost/cgi-bin/printenv.pl ,  it gives the messages such as" Server 
internal error or misconfiguration.....".  I opened the error log, it always 
says:

[Wed Aug 06 08:51:17 2003] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] (OS 3)The system cannot 
find the path specified.  : couldn't spawn child process: C:/Program 
Files/Apache Group/Apache2/cgi-bin/printenv.pl

Please help.  Thank you very much.

best regards,
Ken
creator: kcheng112499@hotmail.com
nd@perlig.de
text:
This is not a support forum. Please address your issue to a user mailing list or
newsgroup (<http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/faq/support.html>) unless it's a
bug or a feature request.

(Hint: the httpd cannot find the perl interpreter)
